languages.text: "А ты — отважн{mf|ый|ая}, не испугал{mf|ся|ась}! Славно, ищи же путь к буровой площадке, а мы пока придержим скверного колдунишку". {n}Торбальд обменивается со своими воинами взглядами, и можно поклясться, что под шлемами их расцветают улыбки предвкушения.{/n}

"You're a brave one, and not easily deterred! Good! Then find a way to reach the tunnelling platform while we give the mangy sorcerer something to worry about." {n}Thorbald exchanges glances with his warriors, and you could swear they all smile in anticipation inside their helmets.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А ты — отважн{mf|ый|ая}, не испугал{mf|ся|ась}! Славно, ищи же путь к буровой площадке, а мы пока придержим скверного колдунишку". {n}Торбальд обменивается со своими воинами взглядами, и можно поклясться, что под шлемами их расцветают улыбки предвкушения.{/n}

traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

Then find a way to reach the tunnelling platform while we give the mangy sorcerer something to worry about." {n}Thorbald exchanges glances with his warriors, and you could swear they all smile in anticipation inside their helmets.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: “你确实很勇敢，什么事情都没法把你吓倒！很好！既然这样，咱们就想办法去那个钻井平台，给那个臭烘烘的巫师点颜色看看。”{n}索巴德和他的战士们交换了一下眼神。你看得出来，他们的头盔之下露出了充满期待的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You're a brave one, and not easily deterred! Good! Then find a way to reach the tunnelling platform while we give the mangy sorcerer something to worry about." {n}Thorbald exchanges glances with his warriors, and you could swear they all smile in anticipation inside their helmets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你确实很勇敢，什么事情都没法把你吓倒！很好！既然这样，咱们就想办法去那个钻井平台，给那个臭烘烘的巫师点颜色看看。”{n}索巴德和他的战士们交换了一下眼神。你看得出来，他们的头盔之下露出了充满期待的笑容。{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: « Quel courage, vous ne vous laissez pas facilement démonter ! Bravo ! Alors, trouvez un moyen d'atteindre la plateforme de forage pendant que nous malmenons ce sorcier miteux. » {n}Thorbald échange des regards avec ses guerriers, et vous avez l'impression de tous les voir sourire d'impatience sous leur casque.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You're a brave one, and not easily deterred! Good! Then find a way to reach the tunnelling platform while we give the mangy sorcerer something to worry about." {n}Thorbald exchanges glances with his warriors, and you could swear they all smile in anticipation inside their helmets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quel courage, vous ne vous laissez pas facilement démonter ! Bravo ! Alors trouvez un moyen d'atteindre la plateforme de forage pendant que nous malmenons ce sorcier miteux. » {n}Thorbald échange des regards avec ses guerriers, et vous avez l'impression de tous les voir sourire d'impatience sous leur casque.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: 「なかなか度胸があるようだな！いいぞ！じゃあ、俺たちがあのクソ魔術師の邪魔をしている間に坑道へ行く方法を見つけるといい」{n}トールバルドは戦士たちと視線を交わし、全員がヘルメットの中で期待に満ちた笑みを浮かべているのが手に取るようにわかる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You're a brave one, and not easily deterred! Good! Then find a way to reach the tunnelling platform while we give the mangy sorcerer something to worry about." {n}Thorbald exchanges glances with his warriors, and you could swear they all smile in anticipation inside their helmets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なかなか度胸があるようだな！いいぞ！じゃあ、俺たちがあのクソ魔術師の邪魔をしている間に坑道へ行く方法を見つけるといい」{n}トールバルドは戦士たちと視線を交わし、全員がヘルメットの中で期待に満ちた笑みを浮かべているのが手に取るようにわかる。{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: «¡Es valiente y no se deja amedrentar! ¡Bien! En ese caso, encuentre la forma de llegar a la plataforma tuneladora mientras le damos a ese hechicero sarnoso algo de lo que preocuparse». {n}Thorbald y sus guerreros se miran y jurarías que sus cascos esconden sonrisas de anticipación.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You're a brave one, and not easily deterred! Good! Then find a way to reach the tunnelling platform while we give the mangy sorcerer something to worry about." {n}Thorbald exchanges glances with his warriors, and you could swear they all smile in anticipation inside their helmets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Es valiente y no se deja amedrentar! ¡Bien! En ese caso, encuentre la forma de llegar a la plataforma tuneladora mientras le damos a ese hechicero sarnoso algo de lo que preocuparse». {n}Thorbald y sus guerreros se miran y jurarías que sus cascos esconden sonrisas de anticipación.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Ihr seid mutig und lasst Euch nicht leicht von Eurem Ziel abbringen! Gut! Dann findet einen Weg, die Tunnelplattform zu erreichen, während wir den räudigen Hexer ein wenig beschäftigen." {n}Thorbald tauscht Blicke mit seinen Kriegern aus, und du könntest schwören, dass sie in ihren Helmen alle vor Vorfreude grinsen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You're a brave one, and not easily deterred! Good! Then find a way to reach the tunnelling platform while we give the mangy sorcerer something to worry about." {n}Thorbald exchanges glances with his warriors, and you could swear they all smile in anticipation inside their helmets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid mutig, lasst Euch nicht leicht von Eurem Ziel abbringen! Gut! Dann findet einen Weg, die Tunnelplattform zu erreichen, während wir den räudigen Hexer ein wenig beschäftigen." {n}Thorbald tauscht Blicke mit seinen Kriegern aus, und du könntest schwören, dass sie in ihren Helmen alle vor Vorfreude grinsen.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Gözü pek birisin, öyle ha deyince de vazgeçmiyorsun! Çok iyi! O zaman sana vazife: Bir bu aşağılık sahiri oyalarken sen de tünel platformuna ulaşmanın bir yolunu bul." {n}Thorbald, savaşçılarıyla bakışıyor. Kasklarının içinde heyecanla sırıttıklarına kalıbını basabilirsin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You're a brave one, and not easily deterred! Good! Then find a way to reach the tunnelling platform while we give the mangy sorcerer something to worry about." {n}Thorbald exchanges glances with his warriors, and you could swear they all smile in anticipation inside their helmets.{/n}
